did.abstract: Letter from Adelaide Mudgley to Mr. L.E. Nicot, resigning from her position as a teacher at Brooklyn's Public School No. 19 in order to get married. Dated 1883. Adelaide Mudgley was a first grade teacher for girls at Public School No. 19 in Brooklyn. At the time of her resignation in 1883, she resided at 256 South Fourth Street.
